definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: The mangosteen fruit has a long history of medicinal use in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果在中医和印度草药医学里的药用历史悠久。

sentences.english: There have been accounts of folk recovering their health in consuming mangosteen juice or tea.
sentences.chinese: 有很多人食用山竹果汁或山竹茶而恢复健康。

sentences.english: There have been accounts of folk recovering their health in consuming mangosteen juice or tea.
sentences.chinese: 有很多人食用山竹果汁或山竹茶而恢复健康。

sentences.english: Analysis of Inorganic Elements in Fruit Pericarp and Pedicel of Garcinia mangostana L.
sentences.chinese: 山竹果皮及果蒂无机元素成分的分析。

sentences.english: The harvest of this fruit, the mangosteen, occurs twice each year.
sentences.chinese: 在这水果丰收的山竹，每年发生两次。

sentences.english: My next experiment with Jesse is with the Mangosteen Fruit.
sentences.chinese: 我的下一个实验杰西是与山竹果。

definition: red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
litchi or lychee fruit (Litchi chinensis Sonn.)
Hami melon (a variety of muskmelon)/honeydew melon/cantaloupe
blue or green jujube/Chinese green date
